Apparently, you were the only "dumb" applicant who agreed to take on the potentially dangerous experiments. The only upside is your pay: you were receiving 100,000 yen per month. If you survive, that is.

Your relation with Julianne went downhill as you constantly shouted at her for even the slightest thing, especially when the tests went bad. Your dream job in Japan had been a nightmare, both to your career and your relationship with Julianne. Last night, Dr. Kijima woke you up in your sleep in the lab, and asked you to help her out for one last experiment: a shrink ray. Just like that, you blacked out.

When you awoke, you find yourself on the floor of what remains of the research lab. You looked at yourself, and surprisingly, the painful frostbite sensation was gone. Your body is intact. You know that Saki does not take intruders to her office or apartment lightly, so you have to be very careful not to get caught by her. Still, her living room is still very lively and attractive, so it is worth exploring. You crept out of her sports bag, and you took a little tour of her living room. As your feet touch the floor, you found yourself on a carpet woven with wool, and it features the main character of a very popular shoujo (young girl) anime. Nearby, you see the different plush toys that Saki owns, from characters of various anime series to simple animal plushes. Though intimidating at first, since some of the plush toys are bigger than your current two-inch frame, you can't help but fall in love with the "cuteness" of the toys. Setting yourself at the lap of a shoujo girl plush toy, you sat down and enjoy the softness of the toy.

Soon, you had enough, and you got off. Making your way towards the console, you are curious about the games that Saki plays at home. Looking at the stack of plastic boxes near the console, you saw a lot of fighting-based and tennis game labels. In a way, you finally know why she is so grumpy and moody when she's not herself. You would play a game, but you are too small to use the controller or even insert a disc into the console. Turning around, you walk away from the console, and you feel something. What is it?
13212111222.title: Around Saki's Living Room

132121112222.content:
Your body begins to feel cold, and pain begins to kick in. You remember this painful sensation from your accident with the shrink ray, and even though it wasn't as painful as before, it was still painful enough to make you yell in pain. As you struggled to control this frostbite sensation, your body begins to shrink down, and it didn't stop until you are only 1/2 an inch tall. You feel tired and sore from the shrinking effect, but now you have other things to worry about. The carpet now feels like tall grass to you, and to make matters worse, Saki is done with her bath.

You hear loud footsteps coming close to you, and you realise that Saki is done with her bath, and she is heading your way. Her foot crashes down beside you with a massive thud, and you looked up. Saki's head feels like half a mile away from you as you look up at her towering body. You can't really see her body, only her pink skirt, which she changed into during her bath, waving around above you. Before you could stare up her skirt, your instincts tell you to get out of the way, which you did, and just in time. Saki began to lower herself into a crouching position, the full weight of her body pressed against her carpet, sinking down with her weight. Luckily for you, she didn't land on you. You were right beside her massive (to you) breasts, and her huge hands then reached for the console. It looks like she's going to play a game, which she did.

You went around her breasts for a "better" look, and your efforts paid off. You can see that Saki is wearing a T-shirt with a low cut, and her small but attractive cleavage is showing. Tempting as it is, if you enter, you will have a high chance of getting caught. Then again, Saki is too busy playing her fighting game to pay attention. What do you do?
132121112222.title: You Shrink Again

1321211122221.content:
The devil inside your head kept goading you get in to Saki's cleavage, saying that you will like it! Overwhelmed by your perverted thoughts and playing right into the devil's hand, you made a dash for it, and jumped right into Saki's fleshy cleavage. With your head inside the soft canyon, you could not help but feel Saki's smooth and bouncy skin on your face. It was warm and very cosy. For once, you thought, I could enjoy this.

Your dream turned into a nightmare, as Saki felt something crawling inside her breasts. She paused her game, and placed her fingers inside to grab whatever is itching out. Her huge fingers felt you, and you were caught. You tried to escape her clutch, but she is still the dominant one, and you were brought into her face. Her face, at this size, was not at all attractive. Worse, she knows who you are, and she is clearly angry.

(In Japanese)
"So, you DID survive that disaster back at the lab!"

She boomed so loudly that you had to bring your hands to your ears to avoid getting them pierced. Saki is clearly enjoying herself, torturing you.

"You have the nerve to enter my boobs. Now, you will pay dearly for this!"

"Please don't do this! I didn't mean it!" You tried as hard to explain yourself, but Saki want no part of it.

"Brace yourself, little human! I'm gonna drop you ... "
1321211122221.title: Nay To Temptation

13212111222211.content:
Saki lifted you up above her head, and she opened her huge mouth, exposing her moist tongue and pearly white teeth. The next moment, she released her grip on you, and you fell into her mouth. Gravity began to work against you as you tried in vain to avoid falling into Saki's mouth. You yelled out in fright as you fall deeper inside Saki's body, and from the looks of it, she is clearly enjoying this. As soon as you slide down her esophagus, she closed her mouth, trapping you inside.

You found yourself inside a fleshy cavern that is Saki's stomach. Inside her stomach are traces of chewed food and stomach acid rgith below. The foul stench inside makes it very unpleasant, and the stomach acid will surely dissolve you if you get too close. Luckily, the acid had not filled up yet, so you are relatively safe. Your surroundings soon began to jerk around, probably from Saki's movements. You lost balance for a while, but you managed to avoid falling into her stomach acid.

You don't want to stay here for too long, and you have to get out of here before Saki digests you. You can force your way out of her stomach, or wait a little longer to plan your escape.
13212111222211.title: In My Mouth

132121112222111.content:
You could only think of one thing: if you manage to cause some hard impact on the stomach walls, Saki might get an indigestion, and you could surely leave this dreaded place that is a young lady's stomach, albeit in a gross and dirty way. You went to the stomach wall section closest to you, and then you started pounding on it, hoping Saki will feel it and get a bad indigestion.

After a while, you fell to your knees, your arms tired out from all that pounding, and nothing is happening. Saki, meanwhile, had felt something knocking on her stomach wall, and is liking it. Continuing with her game, she gleefully awaits you to be digested and become a part of her.

Back inside, you try desperately to get back and pound again, but exhaustion got in the way even as you kept one fist onto her stomach wall.

(In Japanese)
"That won't work! I've already tried that!"

You turn around and you see a odd looking Japanese man about your size. He had short black, thick-rimmed glasses and a earpiece of sorts on his right ear. He wore a typical outfit that a Japanese salaryman would wear to work, and had the quirkiest shoes on his feet.

Using your limited Japanese vocabulary, you tried to communicate.

(The dialogue is all in Japanese from this point)
"Who are you? What are you doing here?"

"I know you! You're that test subject for Dr. Kijima, aren't you? Jon, right? I didn't know you ended up like this too!"

"Wait! How did you know me in the first place?"

"I have known you for a while. I'm Hiroki, Hiroki Iketani. I'm Dr. Kijima's assistant researcher, though I have been unable to talk to you since I got caught."

"Caught? By Saki?"

"Yes. I saw her taking pictures of the blueprints for the shrink ray project. Though I don't know why, she appears to have some issues with something. Before I could report her, she used the shrink ray on me and threw me in her stomach, which is where am I now. I have been in here for almost 2 days now, luckily I have my nano shield, or I would not be here talking to you now."

Shrink rays. Nano shields. This was just too much for you. Though this Hiroki guy looks like he's telling the truth, it is still hard to believe. Pulling yourself together from this "nonsense", you tried to ask him for a way out.

Does he?
132121112222111.title: Mr. Quirky

1321211122221111.content:
(All dialogue is in Japanese)

You brightened up at his answer, but you have little time to waste, as the stomach juices in Saki's stomach is beginning to act up. Desperate, you tell him to hurry up and tell him the plan.

"Well, my nano shield is almost low on power, so I can't depend on it. I have been dying to test these running shoes, though. I trust my shoes enough to run all the way to Saki's mouth."

"OK, whatever! Just do it!"

Hiroki activated his nano shield, which looks like a sphere with blue hexacombs all over it, with you inside, of course. As Saki's stomach juice starts to flood the place, you notice that the shield is repelling the acid, meaning you won't get digested. Then comes the next part: getting out of Saki's esophagus.

Saki is still lying down on her stomach, so climbing out is not an issue, but the muscles inside the esophagus still poses a threat. A wrong move and you will end up into the nasty stomach juice. Hiroki triggered his running shoes, causing yellowish jet streams to erupt from behind. Unable to fully control the speed and direction, you grabbed Hiroki before he rocketed off towards the esophagus.

As Hiroki ran, you see that his nano shield is fighting back the muscles inside Saki's esophagus. Normally, you would be in awe of what Hiroki had developed, but he is too focused on getting out and his face had been deformed by the speed of his shoes.

As he ran, his footsteps began to tickle Saki's throat, causing her to start coughing. Inside, as you and Hiroki made the dash towards her mouth, an unexpected help came as a huge air flow came behind, boosting your speed. As Saki starts coughing, Hiroki and you manage to successfully escape, though the shoes started to lose steam and the nano shield faded.

Upon impact onto Saki's carpet, the two of you have little time to ponder about your options. Saki had seen the two of you fly out of her mouth, and is really mad that the two of you had escaped. She got up to her full height, looking to squash you under her foot. Making matters worse, Hiroki's shoes had a LONG reload time, and he is already exhausted from the running and his (obvious) lack of physical activity.

As Saki's foot looms closer, what happens next?
1321211122221111.title: Running For Everything

13212111222211111.content:
In that split instant, you managed to grab Hiroki by his waist, and jumped to one side, avoiding Saki's monstrous foot. It was then that you realized that your "powers" are still intact, and you could easily outmanuvere Saki given the right moment and the right time. As Saki raises her foot, you took the time, to look around and find a way out. Though Saki's apartment door is closed, the gap between the floor and door is enough for you two to escape at this size.

You only have so much time before Saki drops her foot on you again, so you made a mad dash to the door, still carrying Hiroki while avoiding Saki's attack. Your speed, despite being slowed down for carrying Hiroki, was still enough to make it to the door before Saki. At the door, you rolled Hiroki through the gap, and crawled through it before Saki could grab you with her fingers, the size of massive tree trunks at your size.

You ran and ran as far as your legs can carry you. Finally, exhaustion kicks in for you, and you finally dropped on the floor. It appears that Saki had given up on chasing you, but from here on, what will happen next. You looked at Hiroki, who had somewhat recovered.

(Translated from Japanese)
"Thanks for the ride! I thought I was a goner there!"

"OK, we're out! Now what?"

"I don't know what Saki plans for the shrinking device, but we have to stop her. We can go back to Fukujima Labs and wait for Dr. Kijima, or you can head over to my place to think about it. Your call."

You pick ...
13212111222211111.title: Escape Mk 3

132121112222111112.content:
(All dialogue is in Japanese)

"Let's go to your place. I think it's too dangerous to head to Fukujima Technologies at this size and hour."

"A brilliant choice, if I may say so."

Hiroki then pulled a remote of sorts out of his suit, and pressed the main button. Nothing happened at first, but then a small space shuttle of sorts came out of the blue, and landed near Hiroki and yourself.

"I built this as a hobby, though I never expected to actually RIDE in it. Come on, let's go to my place."

You boarded Hiroki's "shuttle", and then Hiroki configured some buttons on his remote, and the shuttle started moving again. While inside, you were too tired to say anything sarcastic anymore, so you decided to take a little rest.

While in flight, it appears that the shuttle is having some malfunctions, and Hiroki is doing his best to fix the problem. As the shuttle flys towards Hiroki's place, it looks like it might not last long, and the door that held this thing down is on the verge of being ripped off. Did it?
132121112222111112.title: Troubled Flight

1321211122221111121.content:
Luckily, even though the shuttle looks like it needs to be tricked out badly, it still managed to hold on all the way to Hiroki's place, a small house in a suburb in western Tokyo. As the two of you alighted the "shuttle" you saw a giant woman sitting nearby. You realized that you had somehow landed onto a dining table of sorts, and the giantess there seems to expect Hiroki. She looked no younger than 17 or 18, had long hair tied into a ponytail, very small breasts but very smooth hair and skin. If she was related to Hiroki, then something must be terribly wrong, you thought to yourself.

(In Japanese)
"You're home, Hiroki." The giantess said.

"I'm sorry, Reiko. I had another encounter, and ... "

"I'm just glad you're home."

As she said that, Reiko then lifted her right hand up, clenched it into a fist, and slammed it down on the table, causing a small earthquake on your platform. The fist landed inches away from Hiroki, taking him aback. Strange girl, you thought to yourself.

"What did I tell you before? If you are coming home late or had an 'accident', at least give me a call!"

Hiroki got up, and bowed repeatedly to the giantess in apology.

"I'm sorry, Reiko. Really sorry."

The giantess, seeing a tiny Hiroki bowing at her, could not feel angry any longer, and gently tapped him with her finger.

"OK, just don't forget it next time. By the way, who is your friend over there?"

"Oh, him. He's one of my colleagues. His name is Jon. I 'picked him up' on the way home."

"He looks cute, and hungry. Stay here, while I try to fix something up for you. No funny business!"

As the giantess gets up and walks away, your mind still could not piece together the clues presented to you. The giantess knows Hiroki, alomst killed him, and now she's making dinner for him.

"She's my sister, Reiko. She's a nice girl, though she had odd ways of expressing it."

"Tell me about it! She seems to take an interest in me, though."

"Oh, she had never seen a gaijin (rough translation: outsider) before. Oh, here she comes!"

Reiko approached the table, holding two things in her hand. On one, a small pot with hot water, and in the other, a few grains of rice and a bits of leftover fish.

"It's all I can provide this late at night. You can take a bath or you can eat first. I'll see you guys later."

As she walks away, Hiroki turns to you.

"So, what are you going to do now?"
1321211122221111121.title: Hiroki's Home

13212111222211111211.content:
The obvious choice of course is to take a bath. After spending time in Saki's shoe and stomach, the first thing you want to do is to wash away the darn smell. Hiroki did not seem to mind, and he watched you getting a dip while having a discussion.

(Translated from Japanese)
"You seem to have a good life, your sister taking care of you and all." You began.

"Yeah, it's been like that since my schooling days. Both my parents are rarely home, so Reiko and I shared our responsibilities to this house though my parents still pay the rent."

"By the way, earlier you said you had 'another encounter'. Could you care to explain exactly what you meant by that? I'm curious, because I thought your company was the only one who developed that shrink ray."

"OK, I'll confess. I was a victim of being shrunk as well. It was during my high school days. My nemesis tricked me into drinking tea spiked with a shrinking formula. Though I was able to get back to normal, my main purpose now is try and reverse that shrinking formula before it strikes again. That's my reason to join Fukujima Technologies in the first place."

"Was that the reason you developed the nano shield and your running shoes?"

"Yes, the nano shield was a joint project by Dr. Kijima and myself. The running shoes was my own creation, and as you can see, I suck at running."

You giggles, but continued soaking yourself in the warm water.

"So, do you plan to stop Saki or anything?"

"Oh, absolutely."

After your little bath and a good meal, the two of you headed back to Hiroki's room. You look around, and you are amazed to see a lot of figurines from various anime. It seems Hiroki and Saki had a lot in common, yet somehow Hiroki got swallowed. You did not think much, as you soon found yourself a bit tired. Hiroki was on his now-massive bed, and asked you to join him.

On his bed, Hiroki showed you your corner of the bed, and you both said your goodnights. As you laid your head on Hiroki's bed, you can't help but wonder how your girlfriend is doing right now, and your folks back home. You then fell asleep.

You wake up the next day, and you see Reiko's huge body above you, blocking out most of the light.

"Hiroki, wake up! You have a guest."

The both of you wake up, still rubbing your eyes and looking up at Reiko, who then turned away to open the door. It was ...

Hiroki only shook his head, which you took as a no. You wanted to ask him more questions, but he reached his hand out and stopped you. "This place is full of bacteria and bacterial gases. Let's hustle, before the bacteria attempts to penetrate the shield!"

1321211122221121.title: The Great Escape

13212111222211211.content:
Saki did not close her mouth in time, causing you and Hiroki to successfully get out of her mouth before she shut her huge chompers. (In Japanese)
"Great! We're free! Now what?" You said with a sarcastic tone. You managed to escape being eaten, only to "fly" around like an idiot.

"Patience is a virtue, my friend!" Hiroki said calmly. "I'm sure the wind will help us."

1321211122221121111111112.title: Captured!

13212111222211211111111121.content:
It was later reported that Saki Yamamoto, the culprit behind the giantess incident in Tokyo, had suddenly and mysteriously disappeared. Apparently, she had completely disappeared by the time she was brought to the detention center. Hiroki had theroised that the shrink beam had become too powerful, and it took effect on Saki, shrinking her down to microscopic size and beyond, but the real effects may remain unknown.

Meanwhile, Dr. Kijima had successfully reversed the effects of the shrink beam on the victims, including Prof. Fukujima. While grateful to be back to normal, Prof. Fukujima decided to call it a day, and retire. Before he retired, however, he handed over Fukujima Technologies, or what's left of the building, to Dr. Kijima. He was quite impressed with Dr. Kijima's quick handling of the situation, and he also praised you and Hiroki for your bravery.

As a way of saying thank you for helping to sort this whole mess out, Dr. Kijima, as the new boss of Fukujima Technologies, offered to give you a bonus and a formal job release (your test subject status) as a token of gratitude. Although tempting, you decided to turn down the offer, and approach her for a new job instead. Dr. Kijima knows of your educational background, and wanting to help you get back with your girlfriend, decided to put you in charge of human resource, and she will also find a suitable job for Julianne so you may spend time together. You gladly accepted the offer.

A few years later, Dr. Kijima, a very successful scientist and businesswoman, was asked to pose for "Science Weekly", ironically for trick photography depicting her standing tall over skyscrapers, obviously inspired from her role in the Tokyo giantess incident. Hiroki found a new job as a pitcher for a very famous baseball team. His pill throwing antic caught the eye of many baseball managers, and he was swarmed with contract offers to play with them. Your once estranged relation with Julianne is now a thing of the past, and you plan to marry Julianne sometime later in the year. You also broke into the science industry, innovating a new odour-masking formula for both men and women to use. Your innovation is a success, and you are now living life in Japan. It is hard to believe that so much success came from such a meager job of being a test subject for a shrink beam.
13212111222211211111111121.title: Good Ending

13212111222211211111111122.content:
Saki began to shrink. And with her quiet and somewhat sad demeanor, you rush to her.

"We have to help her!" you called out to Hiroki and Dr.Kijima. Hiroki adjusted his glasses "There's...nothing we can do, Hartley-san". You embraced the ever shrinking Saki as she was the size of a young child. "Well, if you don't do anything, then I will!!" You say as you lift her into your arms and begin to carry her off.

"And what do you plan to do? Care for her even after she shrinks into oblivion?" Dr.Kijima asks

"If need be, then I will." You say as you look into your arms at the shrinking Saki. Saki looks up at you unable to say a word, tears flow down her face. "Call me insane. Call me responsible for all these lives. Do what you want. I want to protect her.....No matter how long she is alive...."

"Hartley-san...." Hiroki looks down and pulls out a tablet. "The muting pill will wear off in a day....these pills are experimental. The red ones for reducing and the blue ones for growing. If you truely wish to save her....then do it."

Dr.Kijima stared in shock. "What are you doing?! Don't you realize what she's done?! She--"

"She will pay for her crimes.....but she can't do that if she's dead...." Hiroki responds.

You look to Dr. Kijima and Hiroki. "If....If it's okay, then I'd like her punishment to be under house arrest......with me....Please......Hiroki. I don't want to see her suffer anymore"

Hiroki nods. "She's fired.....but you've been a great employee.....We trust her into your care."

You look into your palm at the doll-sized Saki in your arms and put a blue pill into her mouth. She looks up at you and you rub her throat. She swallows the large pill down her throat and coughs with tears flowing down her face. You speak to her in English "Good girl. You haven't done anything wrong....I'm going to make everything all better." As some Japanese army appear, they ask you were the evil giantess went. You pocket the tiny Saki and respond in horrible Japanese "Cow is in Dakota's toilet". The troops look at each other as the general responds "This stupid American couldn't have seen anything let's keep moving! We have to find that evil girl before it's too late!" The army heads out and you take Saki out of your pocket. You rub her head and assure her that it'll be alright.

"Wait....Hiroki. He won't be able to sneak her out like this. What about the airlines?" Dr.Kijima questions.

You think for a while and pull open the front of your pants. "Please forgive me for this, Saki" Before you put her in front of your crotch Dr.Kijima looks away in disgust "Typical Americans."

Hiroki puts his hand on your shoulder "I know of a better way. I can help you bypass that station. I know someone that can help."

"OH HARTLEY!!!!" A girl's voice yells out. It's Julianne. You hide Saki in your crotch since your pants are still stretched and you turn towards her. "Y-Yes?"

"Hartley, this place is so disgusting now that it's so destroyed. Can we go home now?" She asks out annoyingly. You look at Hiroki and nod. "Yeah...let's go home." You shake Hiroki's and Dr.Kijima's hands and you walk away. Hiroki helped you to the nearest airport and asks a security officer to let you through without walking through the detectors. But he insisted on a wand scanner. He waved it over you and found nothing.

On board the plane you sat next to your girlfriend with tiny Saki in tow. You wave at Dr.Kijima and Hiroki as the plane takes off. You have their contact information and plenty of fine memories you've spent in Japan. As Japan grows ever so distant, you sit back and remember all everything that's happened and the plans for the girl you promised to make amends to. Julianne looks at the lump of a crotch you have and giggles a bit "Maybe that trip in Japan was worth it after all." She places her hand on your crotch. Pressing Saki against your Penis. At this time, her muted pill has worn off and she complains loudly in Japanese "Stupid American perverts! Let me out of here! HELP!!!! HELP ME!!!". You simply blush as Julianne unknowingly masturbates the nude scientist against your penis and respond. "Yeah....I suppose it was." You kiss her on the plane as you both return home to America....with the once terrible giantess as your new pet.


To be continued.......?
13212111222211211111111122.title: Wonderful ending

132121112222112111111112.content:
You watched as the pistol was being bobbed around on the near non-existent floor by the giant steps of Dr. Kijima and Saki, both having a fight of sorts in the middle of downtown Tokyo. You know if you get in the crossfire, you would surely end up like a squashed fruit, so you decided to wait for the pistol to be kicked towards you.

However, in their scuffle, Dr. Kijima accidently stepped on the pistol, causing it to break into tiny fragments in the pavement. Hiroki and you watched in horror as your only ticket to end this fiasco was smashed to bits right in front of your eyes. Making matters worse, Saki lunged a fist towards Dr. Kijima, but missed and struck the building where Hiroki was. The roof of the building was destroyed, and Hiroki barely made it downstairs to join you.

(In Japanese)
"That was a close one!" Hiroki exclaimed, still panting from the mad dash down the building.

Before you could say anything, you heard voices coming from the distance, in two directions to be exact. You looked to one side, and you saw 2 Japanese ladies, waving and calling out to Hiroki. On the other side, a very familiar voice called out to you, in a rather angry tone.

"JON HARTLEY! YOU HAVE A LOT OF EXPLAINING TO DO!!!"

It was Julianne, your long neglected girlfriend, and she is really angry with you. It turns out the hotel you booked in was caught in the scuffle, and after Julianne evacuated from the building, she saw you watching the two giant ladies fight and now she wants a piece of you!

"This was the worst place you have ever brought me to! First, you hauled me off with you to this crazy country they call Japan, then you neglected me and now THIS! If I wasn't in great danger, I'd have dumped your sorry a** by now!"

(In Japanese)
"Hey, Hartley-san! Who's that woman? Why is she yelling at you?"

"Uh, Hiroki, this is my soon-to-be ex-girlfriend, Julianne. I kinda neglected her while working, so ... who are those two anyway?"

"Oh, meet my sister Reiko and my childhood friend, Yuriko. I too have a lot of explaining to do ... "

The 5 of you were about to start a loud din, but it looks like the giantess fight is getting closer than expected. All of you managed to get out of the way before Saki tackled Dr. Kijima down and destroying a huge commercial block in the process. All of you scrambled onboard Yuriko's car and drove off before more rubble fell on you.

(In Japanese)
"Hiroki! You had better fix this problem!" Yuriko said, driving and avoiding the constantly falling rubble.

"OK, OK, I can fix it! Drive back to my house! I may have a solution. Hartley-san, Julianne-san, I'll need your help too!"

"OK, man! As long as I don't get dumped right here, right now!"

You all then headed towards the Iketani residence.
132121112222112111111112.title: Change Of Plans!

1321211122221121111111121.content:
Up till now, western Tokyo had been spared the damage caused by the giantess fight downtown, so naturally it was the best place to go. By a coincidence, Hiroki lived in the west, so you can calmly approach this problem without the fight getting in your way.

At the Iketanis' residence, all 5 of you got into Hiroki's room for a "discussion". Looking at Hiroki's room, you could finally understand why he looked like that. He had countless manga volumes piled up on his shelves, and lots of figurines of anime girls and robots, all of which he painted himself. His room was also filled with posters of various anime you had came in contact with. Though the room was small, it was big enough to squeeze all of you into.

(Dialogue in Japanese)
"Hiroki, please tell me this had nothing to do with shrink rays, tiny men or giant women."

"I'm sorry, Reiko, it is. OK, so now it seems our only ticket to stop this madness had been destroyed by the two giantesses, one of which is my superior. If we are to stop them, we need another shrink ray device."

"We don't have another one, Hiroki. Especially after the whole Technology Club incident years ago!"

"Actually, Yuriko, we have one option left. You still remember when Saki was flying that helicopter around with the huge shrink ray? Even though Dr. Kijima had ripped it off the helicopter, the device is still intact. We can use it to shrink them both down."

"Hiroki, that device looked much heavier than I thought. How are you going to move it around, let alone use it?"

"Hartley-san, please! I worked at the lab longer than you, so I know what to do."

Hiroki reached into his pocket, and pulled out a small silver tube-like object out of his pocket. It looked like a typical laser pointer, but you can tell it isn't.

"I made a resizing device of my own, but this only works on machinery. You can pick any of my robots on my shelf. I've already modified them to move ever since I got myself shrunk back in high school. It may be our only key out of this mess."

Julianne was still unhappy with you, but since she's been dragged into this mess, she agreed to help. It was time to pick one of Hiroki's robots, and two attracted your eyes. You can pick the red one labelled "Akakaze" (Japanese: Red Wind) or the white one labelled "Byakurai" (Japanese: White Lightning).
1321211122221121111111121.title: Time For Action

13212111222211211111111211.content:
You picked the bright red mecha with the initials "Akakaze" as it was very noticable, being moderately larger than the others on Hiroki's shelf, and its fire engine red scheme too made it the obvious choice. However, after pointing out your choice to Hiroki, you were a little surprised to realize that the mech needed 2 pilots, so he advised you to try and patch things up with Julianne first while he resized and configured his figurine mechs.

Julianne was visibly unhappy with you even after all this time, and you know no matter how many times you apologize, she still can't forgive you. After all, you were the one who brought her and life as a test subject also caused you to neglect and yell at her after you had a rough day. Still, if it were any other girl in her place, she would have dumped your sorry butt and moved on already, so there still might be a faint chance of reconcillation.

"You know I'm still going to dump you after all this mess is over, right?" Julianne sarcastically said.

"I know! I also know that no matter what I do to make it up to you, nothing will work. Our relationship is as good as over."

"Still, it wasn't an entire waste of time here. While you were away at work, I went outside to have a look at this country for myself and made friends with Miss Yuriko over there. She showed me around, and even comforted me after you kept yelling at me after a bad day. Though I would like to stay here, I think I'm going straight home once all this is over."

"That's why I dated you in the first place. You were pretty hardy and independent, which was what I liked about you. I'm sure you will find a better person once you get home. Until then, would you help me?"

"Sure, why not? I already lost all my luggage when the giantess punched the hotel block. It couldn't get any worse."

You two embrace each other, but you didn't have time to enjoy this as Hiroki called out to you.

(In Japanese)
"Hartley-san! Your mech is ready!"

Reiko and Yuriko have decided against joining Hiroki and yourself into piloting his mechs, but will join you guys later. Meanwhile, as you climbed into the now almost 11ft red mecha, you can't help but feel a little strange. It felt like those old TV shows you watched in the past, only it's for real and YOU are the "hero" of this. As the two women waved goodbye to you guys, the two mechs (Hiroki picked the "Byakurai") lifted off and headed towards Tokyo to stop the giantess fight.
13212111222211211111111211.title: Before The Storm

132121112222112111111112111.content:
As you and Julianne co-pilot the Akakaze, you decided to squeeze out some information about Hiroki. After all, he seem to know about the shrink ray and seemingly developed this mechanized walker technology. If there is anyone who understands what's wrong around here, it would be him.

(Dialogue Translated)
"Hiroki, I'm curious! You seem to know quite a lot about the shrink ray project, and judging from the time I found you in Saki's stomach, you seem to know quite a lot about being shrunk. Please, tell me your story. I need to know."

Hiroki hesitated for a while, but eventually answered.

"OK, but what I'm about to say might puzzle and even be labelled unbelieveable, but it's all the truth."

"I'm listening, and so is Julianne."

"In my high school days, I got into an encounter with the Technology Club at school, and got shrunk in the process. I was almost squashed and even eaten on one occassion, but they didn't stop me. Eventually, I entered their headquarters in school and found myself a cure,"

"Did it end there?"

"I wish, but it didn't. The Technology Club Chairman was so angry when I screwed up her "Shrink All" project, that she turned the device on herself and grew into a near 100ft tall giantess. I had to stop her, and I found her prototype mechs in the garage, which I later used to build these. I stopped her, but much of my school was ruined in the process. Somehow, Saki also found the blueprints for her shrink ray, which I think she found from the ruins. She used to study there as well."

"So, how come after all that, nothing was ever reported outside?"

"Our government decided that it was too dangerous to allow the outside world to know about all this advanced technology lest it falls into the wrong hands, so the matter was deemed "Top Secret" and everyone was given the silence order and a bribe of sorts to firmly keep open mouths shut. I never spoke about my high school life to anyone ... until now."

You paused after hearing Hiroki's tale. It was quite unbelieveable, and even Julianne was stunned.

"So, I'm directly responsible for what happened to you, and I'm sorry for that. Before you two start pounding me into dust, let's focus on stopping the two giantesses straight ahead!"

While talking with Hiroki, you didn't realize your mechs had already arrived in central Tokyo, where the scuffle is. By this time, are the giantesses still at it, or had Saki already delivered the final blow to Dr. Kijima?
132121112222112111111112111.title: Hiroki's Past

1321211122221121111111121112.content:
PUNCH!

With just one punch, Saki had punched Dr. Kijima in the face and sent her crashing down onto whatever's left of Tokyo. Dr. Kijima is still conscious, but she's been badly roughed up. Hiroki saw his superior been floored, and quickly rushed to her aid.

(Dialogue Translated)
"Dr. Kijima! Are you all right?"

"No! I've been messed up rather badly! You have to carry on the fight without me."

"Ha ha ha! Looks like even Dr. Kijima, the best brains of Fukujima Technology, is still weaker than my fist! Since you have ruined my plans, I'm going to destroy all of you before making this whole world worship me!"

Hiroki had no time to waste, and turned his Byakurai and fired his weapons at Saki.

"Hartley-san! Find that shrink ray and use it on Saki! I'll handle her! GO!"

You agreed, and turned around to scour the city for the device while Hiroki kept the pressure on Saki. You remember the place where Dr. Kijima had first stopped Saki's helicopter and ripped the device off, but after she threw it away, there's no telling where the device is now.

"Hey, Jon! I think I see something shiny over to your west."

"OK! Take us there!"

The Akakaze flew westward, and Julianne stopped the mech at where she saw the shiny object. It was the shrink ray all right, though the outer husk had long been destroyed. You got close to it, and to your delight, the device is still fully charged. There may be a chance after all!

"Hey, Hiroki! I have the shrink ray in sight!"

"OK, now just plug it into your mainframe, and you can get the device working. Could you make it quick, as I'm having problems over here!"

Julianne slowly controlled the mech to grab the device, while you tried your best to connect the device into the weapons system mainframe. You were skilled in electronics, but this was the first time you had ever handled something like this. Eventually, you managed to plug the device into the Akakaze, but before you could get back to help Hiroki, you got a shock as you see the Byakurai being flung towards you like a rag doll. Hiroki's mech didn't stop until it hit the tall building behind you. Before your eyes, you can see Saki's huge body walking closer and closer towards you.

"Hiroki, come in! Are you OK?"

"I'm fine, but I'm pretty messed up too. It's now or never, Hartley-san! Fire the shrink ray!"

Looking at the control console, you saw lots of characters you didn't understand, but there are two buttons on the console for you to use. It's either the red or blue button, so you closed your eyes and pushed the ...
1321211122221121111111121112.title: Get The Shrink Ray!

13212111222211211111111211121.content:
You hit the red button, and the raygun fired a red laser at Saki. You looked as the red beam struck Saki, and you hoped that you had made the right choice. Imagine your surprise when you see something amiss.

(Dialogue Translated)
"NOW YOU'VE DONE IT, YOU IDIOT! WHY DID YOU FIRE THE GROWTH RAY?"

That was a growth ray? You stared at your sight in disbelief as Saki's huge size only got bigger and bigger! You took a chance, and now you have a much BIGGER problem in front of you.Saki now seemed like over half a mile tall compared to you at normal height. Even Dr. Kijima at her present height felt like a dwarf compared to Saki's height now.

"Ha ha ha ha ha! Now I'm the biggest being on Earth! Allow me to show you my gratitude, Hartley-san!"

All of you try to run away, but in the end, it was all for nothing. As Yuriko and Reiko finally arrived at the scene, all they see was a foot the size of a stadium hovering over them before flattening everything underneath it. Both the Akakaze and the Byakurai, along with most of western Tokyo, were flattened underneath just one footstep. The main casualties are Professor Takenori Fukujima (at 1/4 of an inch, didn't escape), Dr. Motoko Kijima (100ft), Hiroki and Reiko Iketani, Yuriko Takamoto, Julianne Byron and yourself, Jon Hartley. One mistake you made caused the demise of everyone caught under Saki's gigantic foot.

Meanwhile, Saki had gotten accustomed to her supreme height, and soon got bored of Japan. Now that she was so big, she need not shrink men anymore as they were now the size of ants compared to her. What's left to do now is to go all over the world and force everyone to bow down at the feet of their new goddess, Saki Yamamoto. This, it seems, is the beginning of worse things to come.
13212111222211211111111211121.title: Really Bad Ending

13212111222211211111111211122.content:
You hit the blue button, and the raygun fired the familiar blue ray that had been used to shrink you and many others down to size. However, while the beam had hit Saki, she didn't seem to shrink at all.

(Dialogue Translated)
"Hiroki! I've fired the beam at her, but it's not working!"

"Her body must have gotten used to her huge size by now. You have to find another way to shrink her. Meanwhile, why not shrink down Dr. Kijima so I can get her to safety?"

To the amazement of Hiroki, Julianne and yourself, Dr. Kijima actually started shrinking after you fired the beam at her half-conscious body. Dr. Kijima was back to her normal self, though still badly hurt. Hiroki, by this time, had got the Byakurai peeled off the building and is signalling to his sister and Yuriko, who had just arrived by car. They got off and carried Dr. Kijima into the car, while Hiroki focused his attention on Saki.

"Hartley-san! I think I got it! We'll have to hurt Saki if we want to shrink her back down to size!"

"I don't have a good feeling about this, Hiroki! Besides, I'm not one who likes hurting people!"

"You have to, Hartley-san. If not for my country or for me, do it if you want to save yourself. It was nice conversing with you all this time. I'm saying this now, for I fear we might not have a chance again if we don't stop her!"

Saki had gotten very close to the two mechs, the size of toys to her, and is reaching out her hand to grab you! Julianne sees this, and quickly pilots the Akakaze up and away from Saki's clutches. Even though she never had a formal driving license, she's doing a pretty good job.

"If you two men are done with your conversation, could you give me a hand and stop this giantess from wrecking havoc over Tokyo!"

Julianne's irritated response was a wake-up call to the both of you, and you started firing whatever weapons you have on your mech. After a while of firing, Saki got on one knee, obviously hurt. Hiroki signalled you to fire the shrink ray. You fired it, but is it enough?
13212111222211211111111211122.title: Damage Control

132121112222112111111112111221.content:
No matter now many times you fired the shrink ray at Saki, all she felt was a ticklish sensation at wherever the shrink ray hits. As much of the Tokyo is almost in ruins, it's pretty much a worst-case scenario now. While you and Hiroki ponder your limited options to stop a rampaging giantess, you heard a familiar voice speaking to you. It was Dr. Kijima.

(Dialogue Translated)
"Hartley-san! Iketani-kun! Can you hear me?"

"Dr. Kijima? Are you all right after taking that beating?"

"I'm fine, but listen to me. I think I know how to shrink Saki down, but you aren't going to like what I've planned."

"No, it's fine, Doctor. Carry on!"

"It looks like after being this big for so long, Saki's body had somehow permanently fused with the growth ray. Shrinking her down is still possible, but you'll need stronger energy to counter the growth ray effect all around Saki's body. You'll have to overload the shrink raygun and fire it at her, but that will also mean you'll have to say goodbye to your mechs, Hiroki."

"Ah, no sweat! I can always build another, and these belong to the Technology Club of the past anyway!"

Hearing Dr. Kijima's words felt like seeing a light after being in darkness for so long. You have a way to finally beat this giantess, even though the prospected ending didn't seem too kind. Still, it's now or never, and you have nothing left to lose.

"Julianne! Get ready to eject from this after I fire this one last shot! I'm giving Saki everything I've got!"

"Hartley-san, wait! Let me help too!"

The Byakurai began to feed all its remaining power into the shrink ray, while you worked on the weapons control to divert all power into the shrink ray. Using all power from your Akakaze mech and drawing the reserves from the Byakurai, you fired the shrink ray at Saki, and prayed that a miracle happened.

The shrink ray hit Saki, but she still wasn't shrinking. Even with all the power, nothing happened. However, it seems like Saki's body was being electrocuted, as you see electric sparks all over her. In one moment, Saki's body exploded, taking everyone by surprise. After the black smoke had cleared, Saki was badly hurt, but she was clearly shrinking. As the blue ray enveloped Saki's entire body, her hurt body got smaller and smaller, bringig her back down to her normal size.

It was all over, you thought to yourself, as you, Julianne and Hiroki evacuated from your now powerless mechs. As you watched Hiroki's mechs descending onto the ground, you can't help but feel a little sorry for Hiroki's mechs. Even though it was fun and all, it still felt like you have lost a friend of sorts. As all 3 of you finally reach the ground, you saw an injured Saki in the distance, and headed forward. Somehow, you feel all this was not over.
132121112222112111111112111221.title: One Last Chance

1321211122221121111111121112211.content:
You headed towards a now injured Saki Yamamoto, who was earlier the giantess rampaging Tokyo. Even though she tried to kill you and almost swallowed you into her digestive system, you felt that you have to put an end to all this anyway. As you walked closer, your eyes came upon something within the ruined buildings of Tokyo, and as you got closer, imagine your surprise when you found a gold locket. You opened it, and there was a picture of Saki and, to another surprise, a Japanese-looking version of yourself! Now you know why she resents you so much.

As you approach Saki, all you saw was an injured girl now crying her guts out. She was on top of the world, and now rudely brought back down to size, like in her past relationship. Though still hurt, she was still able to wave her arms and yell the same lines, "Yujiro, you idiot!" and "Why does this happen to me?". You shook your head, and went towards her, hoping you can calm her down.

(Dialogue Translated)
"What! What're you here for, Hartley? Came to rub it in my face?"

"No, Saki. Actually, I came here ... to apologize ... All this time, I always thought you're the "plain-hard to get" type, but now I understand your motives. But you are doing it in the wrong way, and this may seem strange, but please forgive Yujiro, even though I don't know who he is."

Saki paused, having nothing sarcastic to say about your comment. She stared at you in surprise, but later turned away from you, a little embarrassed.

"You have guts, Hartley-san! I like that!"

You turn around, and you saw Dr. Kijima walking towards you and Saki. She then handed to you a vial containing some clear-blue liquid.

"It's a healing formula, but it only cures external injuries. I thought you might need it."

You thanked Dr. Kijima, and then poured the liquid over Saki's injuries. To your amazement, all her wounds all seem to heal as fast as you can imagine, like super-quick regeneration you saw on TV. She's fine, but she did not get up immediately.

"You are really a resemblence to that fool Yujiro, Hartley-san, all the way to his kind personality. I loved him ... but he left me behind after getting a call from an old friend in America. He never came back, so I assumed he dumped me. I was very angry, and I wanted to get back at all men in Japan, so I went back to my old school to salvage anything from the Technology Club fiasco. I found the shrink ray plans, along with a manifest, which made my work easier. When I heard Dr. Kijima there was trying to replicate the shrink ray, I sabotaged her machine and used my device on Hiroki and promptly swallowed him to prevent any leaks to my plan. Honestly, Hartley-san, I never anticipated you getting involved, and you stopped me from making the biggest mistake in my life. Thanks."

"Well, all this talking is making me bored! Jon, even though I said I was going to dump you after all this was over, but seeing you comfort Saki despite all she's done to you reminds me why I fell in love with you in the first place. I don't regret coming to this country, Jon. I'm willing to start anew with you, that is, if you are willing."

You have made many choices in your entire life, but this has to be the biggest and probably, most important, decision you will ever make in life. Which girl do you want to spend time with now? Do you want to stay with Saki and help heal her shattered heart, or do you want to start anew with Julianne, who had somewhat forgiven you by now?

(A/N: Either choice leads to an ending.)
1321211122221121111111121112211.title: Heal A Broken Heart

13212111222211211111111211122111.content:
You decided to stick with Saki and help her move on with her life, meaning you have to leave Julianne behind, which didn't matter since she said she was going to dump you anyway.

"I'm sorry, Julianne, but I think I want to stay here for a while. There's someone here who needs me more."

"It's OK, Jon. Though our relationship is pretty much over, but we can still be friends. Come and see me if you return home, OK?"

Julianne came up to you and gave you a farewell kiss, before turning around and walking away. Though you believed you made the right choice, you still felt a little sad thinking about the memories you had with her. Though she offered you a new start, you decided not to.

(Dialogue translated from Japanese)
"Well, I guess all this is finally over, isn't it?"

All of you got a huge shock seeing a red flash behind you and after the flash subsided, you see Professor Takenori Fukujima, back to his normal size. In his hand, he had a small fragment of the destroyed beam pistol, which he probably used to enlarge himself.
